text: Racing Stripes is a 2005 animated adventure, comedy movie. It stars Frankie Muniz and Hayden Panettiere. The movie was directed by Frederik Du Chau. == Cast == * Hayden Panettiere - Channing Walsh * Frankie Muniz - Stripes * Dustin Hoffman - Tucker * Whoopi Goldberg - Franny * Steve Harvey - Buzz * David Spade - Scuzz * Jeff Foxworthy - Reggie * Snoop Dogg - Lightning == Other websites == * Official site * * Category:2005 movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American animated movies Category:Movies about animals Category:2005 adventure movies Category:Movies composed by Ennio Morricone Category:Movies composed by Mark Isham
title: Racing Stripes
